@Claykaren1993 my suspicion is that either she couldn't assimilate him or that when she did he became his own personality. @qwerqertsadafcw Strictly speaking she didn't kill her. It similar to becoming a borg, you're not dead, but neither are you who you were. It's a theme in Date's works
